mapper.select: select board_num,board_group, board_date, title, recommend,m_content,m_image, user_num from mat_board where board_group = #{aa} order by board_num desc, board_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into mat_board(board_num, board_group, board_date, title, recommend,m_content,m_image, user_num) values(board_seq.nextval,#{board_group},sysdate,#{title},0,#{m_content}, #{m_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{user_num})
